title: Everett True Breaks Into the Movies

sources.title: Everett True Breaks Into the Movies

metadata.Plot: Everett sees a want-ad for film actors in his morning paper and decides to apply. He turns out to be a natural in front of the camera, but his wife does not approve of the love scenes. Based on the comic strip "The Outbursts of Everett True". This silent film features an original, scene-specific piano score compiled from period appropriate photoplay music.
metadata.Actors: Robert Bolder, Elizabeth Erwin, Paul Reinbold
